text: Who You Are is the debut studio album by English singer-songwriter Jessie J, released on 28 February 2011 by Lava Records. The album was originally due to be released a month later but due to Jessie J's popularity the album got brought forward. The album was written over a five year period. ==Critical reception== Who You Are received mainly positive reviews from music critics. ==Certification== On 6 March 2011, Who You Are debuted at number two on the UK Albums Chart, behind Adele's 21. It sold 105,000 copies in its first week. In August 2013 the album was certified quadruple Platinum by the British Phonographic Industry (BPI) for selling 1,200,000 copies in the United Kingdom. ==Track listing== ==Charts and certifications== ===Charts=== Chart (2011â€“2012) Peak position Australian Albums Chart 4 Austrian Albums Chart 22 Belgian Albums Chart (Flanders) 38 Belgian Albums Chart (Wallonia) 26 Canadian Albums Chart 6 Danish Albums Chart 5 Dutch Albums Chart 41 French Albums Chart 15 German Albums Chart 18 Irish Albums Chart 4 Italian Albums Chart 74 New Zealand Albums Chart 4 Swiss Albums Chart 29 UK Albums Chart 2 US Billboard 200 11 ===Year-end charts=== Chart (2011) Peak position Australian Albums Chart 25 New Zealand Albums Chart 10 Swiss Albums Chart 99 UK Albums Chart 8 Chart (2012) Peak position UK Albums Chart 16 ===Certifications=== == Release history == Region Date Label Edition Ireland Universal Music Standard edition Netherlands Switzerland Russia Island Records France Universal Music Belgium Luxembourg Denmark 2 March 2011 Australia 4 March 2011 New Zealand 7 March 2011 Brazil 18 March 2011 Poland Mexico 5 April 2011 United States 12 April 2011 Lava Records, Universal Republic Canada Universal Music Germany 20 May 2011 Japan 8 June 2011 United Kingdom 24 October 2011 Island Records United States 9 November 2011 Lava Records, Universal Republic Platinum/Deluxe Edition United Kingdom 14 November 2011 Island Records Germany 25 November 2011 Universal Music Poland 2 December 2011 ==References== Category:2011 albums Category:Debut albums Category:Jessie J albums Category:Pop albums Category:Hip hop albums Category:R&B; albums
